qas.question: When did the Thunder start winning Northwest Division Titles?
Who is the Thunders head coach?
Who is the Thunders point guard?

context: The Oklahoma City Thunder has been regarded by sports analysts as one of the elite franchises of the NBA's Western Conference and that of a media darling as the future of the league. Oklahoma City has earned Northwest Division titles every year since <a0_0>2009<a0_0/> and has consistently improved its win record to 59-wins in 2014. The Thunder is led by first year head coach <a1_0>Billy Donovan<a1_0/> and is anchored by several NBA superstars, including perennial All-Star point guard <a2_0>Russell Westbrook<a2_0/>, 2014 MVP and four-time NBA scoring champion Kevin Durant, and Defensive Player of the Year nominee and shot-blocker Serge Ibaka.
